LanguageData.SteamWorld_CoalMining.label: Coal mining
LanguageData.SteamWorld_CoalMining.description: Unlocks the stone quarry, as well as the ability to mine coal.
LanguageData.SteamWorld_SteamPower.label: Steam power
LanguageData.SteamWorld_SteamPower.description: Unlocks the steam engine dynamo, which produces electricity from burning coal.
LanguageData.SteamWorld_Telegraphy.label: Electrical telegraphy
